summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 BUICK LUCERNE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ELECTRONIC CONTROL PANEL AND A FUSE BOX INTERNALLY FAILED WITH A WIRES MELTED AND THE CONTACT WAS UNCERTAIN AS TO WHAT CAUSED THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO A REPAIR SHOP AND AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC INSPECTED, DIAGNOSED AND REPAIRED THE VEHICLE. THE REPAIRS WERE UNKNOWN AND THE CONTACT WAS UNCERTAIN IF THE PART MAY FAIL AGAIN. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
